column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Edward - For what it's worth
column2: we are all grateful that you DID post your 5-star review of JINYA-Midtown. We greatly appreciate it. In the coming weeks
column3: we will be opening our third location in Katy
column5: which we're hoping will alleviate some of the very traffic you mentioned at our Midtown spot.
